content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
That is Isabelle/e414bcc5a39e: it will be the final changeset before the
fork-point, which I am going to push in a few minutes ... (You are lucky that
I've had an appointment with the dentist this afternoon.)

Note that e414bcc5a39e will not be in Isabelle2024-RC2, but in
Isabelle2024-RC3. It takes approx. 3-4h from tagging a release to publishing
it, and I did start around 11:00 UTC+2 today, as announced yesterday.

Makarius

isabelle-dev mailing list
isabelle-dev@in.tum.de
https://mailman46.in.tum.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev
